description:
Takumi’s taking on Wataru on a treacherous mountain pass riddled with dangerous traps and obstacles. The true nature of Takumi’s new hidden weapon emerges in all its monstrous glory, however, and his opponent is in store for an intense challenge.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ACT.12 ハチロクVSハチロク 魂のバトル
Hachi Roku vs Hachi Roku Tamashii no Battle
